Contact
-------

**CITY HALL**

* 102 W. Ashley Wilson Rd, Sweeny TX 77480
* PO Box 248, Sweeny, TX 77480
* Main Office – (979) 548-3321
* General Information –
  [info@sweenytx.gov](mailto:info@sweenytx.gov)

* 102 W. Ashley Wilson Rd, Sweeny TX 77480
* PO Box 248, Sweeny, TX 77480
* Deputy Court Clerk – (979) 548-3325

  [courtclerk@sweenytx.gov](mailto:info@sweenytx.gov)

* Office/Admin – (979) 548-3112
